data.title: Crimes Committed by Totalitarian Regimes
data.meta_description: Crimes Committed by Totalitarian Regimes - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides reports and proceedings from a 2008 European public hearing on crimes committed by totalitarian regimes. It is divided into five sections that discuss: the history and characteristics of totalitarian regimes in Europe; a cross-national survey of crimes committed under totalitarian rule; transitional justice approaches to prosecuting and redressing injustice; efforts to promote remembrance, recognition and public awareness of totalitarian history; and perspectives on reconciliation with traumatic totalitarian pasts. The document was edited by Peter Jambrek and published by the Slovenian Presidency of the Council of the European Union.
